edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.SpyNin
Class Board

java.lang.Object
  edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.SpyNin.Board

public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

The object Board represents the grid, represented by an integer array by an array, on which the game takes place. The difficulty will determine the number of ninjas that will spawn on the board. The board facilitates the placement of objects Ninja, Player, and PowerUp, represented by the behavior placeNinja, placePlayer, and placePowerUp. The place briefcase

placeBriefcase

public void placeBriefcase(int[][] grid)
The behavior placeBriefcase spawns a briefcase on the board. Once placed, the behavior of the briefcase doesn't change for the rest of the round.

Parameters:
grid -

placePlayer

public void placePlayer(Player[][] grid)
The method placePlayer spawns a player on the board. Once placed, the player can be moved using methods in the Player Class.

Parameters:
grid -

placeNinja

public void placeNinja(Ninja[][] grid)
The method placeNinja spawns a ninja on the board. Once placed, the ninja is moved using methods in the Ninja Class.

Parameters:
grid -

placePowerUp

public void placePowerUp(PowerUp[][] grid)
The method placePowerUp spawns a power up on the board. Once spawned, the power ups cannot be moved

Parameters:
grid -
